1.content:
You wake up to find you have a email from a website claiming that you are the lucky winner of prize that lets you posses any Disney star you want. You decide to try this out thinking if it works this will be awesome if not that’s also ok. So then you quickly read over the rules and click agree. You are then taken to what looks like a login page for a online game accept you have four choices listed in front of you and a fifth choice for more choices.
The first stars include G Hannelius, Bridgit Mendler, Sierra Mccormick and Francesca Capaldi. And then your choice for more choices.
Who do you decided to go with?
1.title: The Sart

12.content: You then click on Bridgit Mendler and every thing blacks out. You wake up from what seems like 1 second later and look around and realize you are in a dressing room you then look back in the mirror to see the pretty face of Bridgit Mendler looking back at you. You smile because the website actually worked you look on the table that’s in front of you and see today was the last day for the filming of her show Good Luck Charlie. You don’t know how long this will last so you have two options. You could explore her body and have some fun with it or you could leave and explore the rest of the set. What do you decide to do?
12.title: Bridgit Mendler

choices: Kayla Maisonet (G Hannelius best friend in dog with a blog )
Leigh Allyn Baker (Good Luck Charlie mom)
ok one more set of even more choices
155.title: even more?

1553.content: even more choices for all of you.
1553.title: ok one more set of even more choices

info.brief_description: You come across a website that allows you to possess the Disney star of your dreams.
info.description: Your name is Jake. One day you come across a website that lets you magically posses any Disney star you want so you decide to have some major fun with it. The possibilities are almost endless with this opportunity. You then read some of the rules of this and they include. No messing up the career of the star. Lesbian experiences are ok. And no taking pictures for the press.
